verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are all we need,
In a world where darkness came to fall,
You are all I see,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In my heart where loveâ€™s truth will unfold
You are everything, everything to me,
And all of the world will see, Your glory, You died and rose for me!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My Salvation is Jesus the King of Kings,
Our liberation was brought by His victory! (x2)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The son has come to rise,
From the night where evil took its fall,
And we will come to life,
Death has failed, let us praise the Lord of all

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Who is everything, everything to me,
And all of the world will see, His glory, Jesus died and rose for me!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Oh oh oh oh (oh oh oh oh)
You gave everything for me
Oh oh oh oh (oh oh oh oh)
Be everything to me
